line.text: From fairest creatures we desire increase
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That thereby beauty rose might never die
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But as the riper should by time decease
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: His tender heir might bear his memory
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But thou contracted to thine own bright eyes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Feed thy light flame with self-substantial fuel
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Making a famine where abundance lies
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy self thy foe to thy sweet self too cruel
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou that art now the world fresh ornament
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And only herald to the gaudy spring
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Within thine own bud buriest thy content
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And tender churl mak waste in niggarding
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Pity the world or else this glutton be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To eat the world due by the grave and thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
